Key Match Events: Alexis Mac Allister scored the opening goal in the 48th minute
Julián Álvarez scored a long-range goal in the 84th minute
Paulo Dybala scored in stoppage time to seal the victory
Post-Match Reflections: The win strengthened Argentina's grip on top of the South American World Cup qualifying
Argentina looked dominant and untroubled by the absence of talismans Lionel Messi and Ángel Di María
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was Argentina's first competitive fixture since 2013 without Lionel Messi or Angel Di Maria
The win left Argentina with 18 points, five clear of second-placed Uruguay
Others: The match was played at the Monumental stadium in Buenos Aires, Argentina
The referee for the match was Jesus Valenzuela
